name: 500 startups
bio: We uplift people and economies around the world through entrepreneurship.

name: 5AM Ventures
bio: 5AM Ventures is a leading venture capital firm focused on building next-generation life science companies capable of delivering outstanding returns to our investors.

name: Accel
bio: We partner with exceptional founders with unique insights, from inception through all phases of growth.

name: Andreessen Horowitz
bio: Andreessen Horowitz is a private American venture capital firm, founded in 2009 by Marc Andreessen and Ben Horowitz. The company is headquartered in Menlo Park, California. Andreessen Horowitz invests in both early-stage start-ups and established growth companies.

name: Benchmark Capital
bio: Benchmark focuses on early-stage venture investing in mobile, marketplaces, social, and infrastructure and enterprise software.
